IAdditionsStateChangedEvent Interface Reference

Notification when a Guest Additions property changes. More...

Inheritance diagram for IAdditionsStateChangedEvent:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Notification when a Guest Additions property changes.

Interested callees should query IGuest attributes to find out what has changed.
